root: ^Your character enters the room of the princess , the game is nearly finished!
^You hope the game don't crash this far and you have to start all again!
^'Let see what this princess is like ! '
^... and find that this is not at all a princess !
^' Another bug? I wanted to see what the princess was like! '

g-6: ^You notice that the sprite is not glitched
^'I think it was like this in the original game too, it's not a bug '
^'A prince then ? Well I guess it's a surprise! Are you not too disapointed? '
^You feel his gaze upon you, you don't know where to look...
g-11: ^You start talking, but the words fails you. Yet you feel his arm around you
^'It's okay, I know. You were never very discreet you know? '

c-0: ^He kiss you bakc, his hand to your cheeks, before exchanging a smile.
c-1: ^His arm tighten around you, and you feel him kiss your head
c-2: ^He squeeze your hand back, a smile on his face

restart: ^'I am glad you told me. Why not restart the game? With me, this time? '

g-1: ^You feel safe and warm, as you are faced with the character selection screen.
g-3: ^You choose the option, without hesitation. You now have to choose a name.
^You can now enter your name, and somehow, you know this will work this time.
